## Config.ISystemConfigurationInitParams.qualifierDefaultValues property

Optional map of qualifier names to default values. If provided, qualifiers in the system configuration will be updated with these default values. Use `null` as the value to remove an existing default value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
qualifierDefaultValues?: Record<string, string | null>;
```
